name: room 0
desc:
At this moment you are standing at the edge of the forest(room 0)
There are three different rooms near you
Among them lies the only way out of the forest

name: A white room
desc: You are in a simple room with white walls.

name: A blue room
desc: This room is simple, too, but with blue walls.

name: A red room
desc: This room is fancy. It's red!
